# my-accordion



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                               | Type      | Default |
| ------------- | -------------- | ----------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `closeOthers` | `close-others` | Closes open items when others are opened. | `boolean` | `false` |
| `openFirst`   | `open-first`   | Opens the first accordion item on load    | `boolean` | `true`  |
